data.text: Nna nulhumo nna phi no ukhulhuvelhiya, ntu nothanana ushunga nlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo yoyo hothanana ntheko woombone.

Paahi etu, ntu noshunga nlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo akhalheke ntu o uhilhaphachiya, nlhopwana ri ni opani amoka, ntu o wiitawara, ntu o wiitimarikha, ntu o meetelho oombone, ntu naapochera attu, nooria weettuchiha attu,
ntu o uhihapalhiya ama ntu o mahuchuru nansho o ntu o ikiriri, naathana mpuha, hirii ntu o uttuna nchurukhu chinene.
Ntu noshunga inupa awe rata ni waalhelha achishaana awe ukhalha attu o umanya.
Ukhalhawaya ntu aahorieke weemelhelha inupa awe rata, nohalha wooria chani ushunga nlhoko wa attu a Nlhuku?
Ntu rumelhenlhe katashi hipangiye ukhalha nholhelhi, hiwe eefuna ni uhukumulhiya thoko chenre awe Nakare.
Tho, ahimiecheshiyeke ukhalha ntu o meetelho oombone mwa attu ahinatwara nlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Nlhuku, hiwe aalhaphachiya nkaawaya nriankho wa Nakare.
Akavihi o ntheko wo ukavihera nlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo akhalheke attu o meetelho oombone, aneemelhelha nulhumo naya, ahinohapalhiya utheka ama o nikakata no uttuna nchurukhu chinene,
anvarechesha ikeekhene yo nrima worera ipatakulhiye.
Yayo aphimiyeke thoko, ooniyaka wiira kharina nlhatu wo ukhuwachiya, paahi etu, avareke ntheko wo ukaviha nlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo uyo.
Thothoni tho, manyaahanu aya akhalheke attu o meetelho ombone, ahinaapa akhunanaya, o wiitawara ni o ukhulhuvelhiya wo chittu chonkhaye.
Namitheko okaviha nlhoko wa attu anrumelhenlhe Kuristo nothananiya akhalheke nlhopwana o opani amoka nooria weemelhelha rata inupa awe ni waalhelha rata achishaana awe.
Ukhalhawaya akavihi anovara ntheko rata anoothimichiya rata, ni ayo anowooria uhimiacha wo uhoova mwaha unaacha nrima urina aya muulhutaanani ni Kuristo Yesu.
Kinolhepa ilha iwarakha ilha uwaninyu kikhulhuvelhaka uwa uwoonani phiyaru.

Nansho kacherewihiyaka, paahi etu ilha iwarakha ilha, inouhimeriani meetelho ninothananiya ihu ukhalhana attu o iwani ya Nlhuku, irii nlhoko wa attu anonrumelhelha Nlhuku rii nkumi, rii phi nipoto ni nsingi we ikeekhene.
Khaniwo nipampa vachulhu mwaha uvithiye unaacha meetelho ihu o munrimani,
